verses.text: \w Ὅσοι|strong="G3745"\w* \w εἰσὶν|strong="G1510"\w* \w ὑπὸ|strong="G5259"\w* \w ζυγὸν|strong="G2218"\w* \w δοῦλοι|strong="G1401"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἰδίους|strong="G2398"\w* \w δεσπότας|strong="G1203"\w* \w πάσης|strong="G3956"\w* \w τιμῆς|strong="G5092"\w* \w ἀξίους|strong="G0514"\w* \w ἡγείσθωσαν|strong="G2233"\w*, \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὄνομα|strong="G3686"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεοῦ|strong="G2316"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w διδασκαλία|strong="G1319"\w* \w βλασφημῆται|strong="G0987"\w*.

\w Οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w πιστοὺς|strong="G4103"\w* \w ἔχοντες|strong="G2192"\w* \w δεσπότας|strong="G1203"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w καταφρονείτωσαν|strong="G2706"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w ἀδελφοί|strong="G0080"\w* \w εἰσιν|strong="G1510"\w*· \w ἀλλὰ|strong="G0235"\w* \w μᾶλλον|strong="G3123"\w* \w δουλευέτωσαν|strong="G1398"\w*, \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w πιστοί|strong="G4103"\w* \w εἰσιν|strong="G1510"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἀγαπητοὶ|strong="G0027"\w* \w οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w εὐεργεσίας|strong="G2108"\w* \w ἀντιλαμβανόμενοι|strong="G0482"\w*. Conclusion to ‘Relationships’ \w Ταῦτα|strong="G3778"\w* \w δίδασκε|strong="G1321"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w παρακάλει|strong="G3870"\w*.

\w Εἴ|strong="G1487"\w* \w τις|strong="G5100"\w* \w ἑτεροδιδασκαλεῖ|strong="G2085"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w προσέρχεται|strong="G4334"\w* \w ὑγιαίνουσιν|strong="G5198"\w* \w λόγοις|strong="G3056"\w*, \w τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Κυρίου|strong="G2962"\w* \w ἡμῶν|strong="G1473"\w* \w Ἰησοῦ|strong="G2424"\w* \w Χριστοῦ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τῇ|strong="G3588"\w* \w κατ|strong="G2596"\w*᾿ \w εὐσέβειαν|strong="G2150"\w* \w διδασκαλίᾳ|strong="G1319"\w*,

\w τετύφωται|strong="G5187"\w*, \w μηδὲν|strong="G3367"\w* \w ἐπιστάμενος|strong="G1987"\w*· \w ἀλλὰ|strong="G0235"\w* \w νοσῶν|strong="G3554"\w* \w περὶ|strong="G4012"\w* \w ζητήσεις|strong="G2214"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w λογομαχίας|strong="G3055"\w*, \w ἐξ|strong="G1537"\w* \w ὧν|strong="G3739"\w* \w γίνεται|strong="G1096"\w* \w φθόνος|strong="G5355"\w*, \w ἔρις|strong="G2054"\w*,\f + \fr 6:4 \ft ερις \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA,048 [90%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP,NU ¦ ερεις [10%]\f* \w βλασφημίαι|strong="G0988"\w*, \w ὑπόνοιαι|strong="G5283"\w* \w πονηραί|strong="G4190"\w*,

\w διαπαρατριβαὶ|strong="G3859"\w*\f + \fr 6:5 \ft διαπαρατριβαι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA [90%] RP,HF,CP,NU ¦ παραδιατριβαι [5%] OC,TR ¦ διατριβαι [3%] ¦ παρατριβαι [2%]\f* \w διεφθαρμένων|strong="G1311"\w* \w ἀνθρώπων|strong="G0444"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w νοῦν|strong="G3563"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἀπεστερημένων|strong="G0650"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀληθείας|strong="G0225"\w*, \w νομιζόντων|strong="G3543"\w* \w πορισμὸν|strong="G4200"\w* \w εἶναι|strong="G1510"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w εὐσέβειαν|strong="G2150"\w*. \w Ἀφίστασο|strong="G0868"\w* \w ἀπὸ|strong="G0575"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w τοιούτων|strong="G5108"\w*.\f + \fr 6:5 \ft αφιστασο (-σω 3.6%) απο των τοιουτων \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* (96.9%) RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ — ℵA,048 (2.8%) NU ¦ two other variants (0.3%) (How could a gloss dominate the stream of transmission to the tune of 97%?)\f* Concluding considerations Godliness with contentment

\w Ἔστιν|strong="G1510"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w πορισμὸς|strong="G4200"\w* \w μέγας|strong="G3173"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w εὐσέβεια|strong="G2150"\w* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w αὐταρκείας|strong="G0841"\w*.

\w Οὐδὲν|strong="G3762"\w* \w γὰρ|strong="G1063"\w* \w εἰσηνέγκαμεν|strong="G1533"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w κόσμον|strong="G2889"\w*, \w δῆλον|strong="G1212"\w*\f + \fr 6:7 \ft δηλον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [98%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ — ℵA,048 [2%] NU\f* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w οὐδὲ|strong="G3761"\w* \w ἐξενεγκεῖν|strong="G1627"\w* \w τι|strong="G5101"\w* \w δυνάμεθα|strong="G1410"\w*.

\w Ἔχοντες|strong="G2192"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w διατροφὰς|strong="G1305"\w*\f + \fr 6:8 \ft διατροφας \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA [90%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP,NU ¦ διατροφην 048\+sup v\+sup* [10%]\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w σκεπάσματα|strong="G4629"\w* \w τούτοις|strong="G3778"\w* \w ἀρκεσθησόμεθα|strong="G0714"\w*.\f + \fr 6:8 \ft αρκεσθησομεθα \+it rell\+it* ¦ αρκεσθησωμεθα [5%] CP\f*

\w Οἱ|strong="G3588"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w βουλόμενοι|strong="G1014"\w* \w πλουτεῖν|strong="G4147"\w* \w ἐμπίπτουσιν|strong="G1706"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w πειρασμὸν|strong="G3986"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w παγίδα|strong="G3803"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐπιθυμίας|strong="G1939"\w* \w πολλὰς|strong="G4183"\w* \w ἀνοήτους|strong="G0453"\w*\f + \fr 6:9 \ft ανοητους \+it rell\+it* ¦ ανονητους [3%] CP\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w βλαβεράς|strong="G0983"\w*, \w αἵτινες|strong="G3748"\w* \w βυθίζουσιν|strong="G1036"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀνθρώπους|strong="G0444"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w ὄλεθρον|strong="G3639"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἀπώλειαν|strong="G0684"\w*·

\w ῥίζα|strong="G4491"\w* \w γὰρ|strong="G1063"\w* \w πάντων|strong="G3956"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w κακῶν|strong="G2556"\w* \w ἐστιν|strong="G1510"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w φιλαργυρία|strong="G5365"\w*· \w ἧς|strong="G3739"\w* \w τινες|strong="G5100"\w* \w ὀρεγόμενοι|strong="G3713"\w* \w ἀπεπλανήθησαν|strong="G0635"\w*\f + \fr 6:10 \ft απεπλανηθησαν \+it rell\+it* ¦ αποπλανηθησαν CP\f* \w ἀπὸ|strong="G0575"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w πίστεως|strong="G4102"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἑαυτοὺς|strong="G1438"\w* \w περιέπειραν|strong="G4044"\w* \w ὀδύναις|strong="G3601"\w* \w πολλαῖς|strong="G4183"\w*. Lay hold on eternal life

\w Σὺ|strong="G4771"\w* \w δέ|strong="G1161"\w*, \w ὦ|strong="G3739"\w* \w ἄνθρωπε|strong="G0444"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w*\f + \fr 6:11 \ft του \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [98%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ — ℵA,I [2%] NU\f* \w Θεοῦ|strong="G2316"\w*, \w ταῦτα|strong="G3778"\w* \w φεῦγε|strong="G5343"\w*· \w δίωκε|strong="G1377"\w* \w δὲ|strong="G1161"\w* \w δικαιοσύνην|strong="G1343"\w*, \w εὐσέβειαν|strong="G2150"\w*, \w πίστιν|strong="G4102"\w*, \w ἀγάπην|strong="G0026"\w*, \w ὑπομονήν|strong="G5281"\w*, \w πρᾳότητα|strong="G4236"\w*.\f + \fr 6:11 \ft πραοτητα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [95%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ πραυτητα [2%] ¦ πραυπαθιαν ℵA [3%] NU\f*

\w Ἀγωνίζου|strong="G0075"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w καλὸν|strong="G2570"\w* \w ἀγῶνα|strong="G0073"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w πίστεως|strong="G4102"\w*· \w ἐπιλαβοῦ|strong="G1949"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w αἰωνίου|strong="G0166"\w* \w ζωῆς|strong="G2222"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w ἣν|strong="G1510"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w*\f + \fr 6:12 \ft και \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [40%] OC,TR ¦ — ℵA [60%] RP,HF,CP,NU (OC has small type.)\f* \w ἐκλήθης|strong="G2564"\w*—\w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὡμολόγησας|strong="G3670"\w*\f + \fr 6:12 \ft ωμολογησας \+it rell\+it* ¦ ομολογησας [10%]\f* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w καλὴν|strong="G2570"\w* \w ὁμολογίαν|strong="G3671"\w* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w πολλῶν|strong="G4183"\w* \w μαρτύρων|strong="G3144"\w*.

\w Παραγγέλλω|strong="G3853"\w* \w σοι|strong="G4771"\w*\f + \fr 6:13 \ft σοι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A [98%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP[NU] ¦ — ℵ [2%]\f* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεοῦ|strong="G2316"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ζωοποιοῦντος|strong="G2227"\w*\f + \fr 6:13 \ft ζωοποιουντος \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵ [95%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ ζωογονουντος A [5%] NU\f* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πάντα|strong="G3956"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w Χριστοῦ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Ἰησοῦ|strong="G2424"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μαρτυρήσαντος|strong="G3140"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w Ποντίου|strong="G4194"\w* \w Πιλάτου|strong="G4091"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w καλὴν|strong="G2570"\w* \w ὁμολογίαν|strong="G3671"\w*,

\w τηρῆσαί|strong="G5083"\w* \w σε|strong="G4771"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐντολὴν|strong="G1785"\w* \w ἄσπιλον|strong="G0784"\w*, \w ἀνεπίληπτον|strong="G0423"\w*\f + \fr 6:14 \ft ανεπιληπτον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [97%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ ανεπιλημπτον ℵ [3%] NU\f* \w μέχρι|strong="G3360"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐπιφανείας|strong="G2015"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Κυρίου|strong="G2962"\w* \w ἡμῶν|strong="G1473"\w* \w Ἰησοῦ|strong="G2424"\w* \w Χριστοῦ|strong="G5547"\w*,

\w ἣν|strong="G1510"\w* \w καιροῖς|strong="G2540"\w* \w ἰδίοις|strong="G2398"\w* \w δείξει|strong="G1166"\w*\f + \fr 6:15 \ft δειξει \+it rell\+it* ¦ δειξη [2%] CP ¦ δειξαι [1%]\f*—\w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μακάριος|strong="G3107"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w μόνος|strong="G3441"\w* \w Δυνάστης|strong="G1413"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Βασιλεὺς|strong="G0935"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w βασιλευόντων|strong="G0936"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w Κύριος|strong="G2962"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w κυριευόντων|strong="G2961"\w*·

\w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μόνος|strong="G3441"\w* \w ἔχων|strong="G2192"\w* \w ἀθανασίαν|strong="G0110"\w*, \w φῶς|strong="G5457"\w* \w οἰκῶν|strong="G3624"\w* \w ἀπρόσιτον|strong="G0676"\w*· \w ὃν|strong="G3739"\w* \w εἶδεν|strong="G3708"\w* \w οὐδεὶς|strong="G3762"\w* \w ἀνθρώπων|strong="G0444"\w* \w οὐδὲ|strong="G3761"\w* \w ἰδεῖν|strong="G3708"\w* \w δύναται|strong="G1410"\w*· \w ᾧ|strong="G3739"\w* \w τιμὴ|strong="G5092"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w*\f + \fr 6:16 \ft και \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA [85%] RP,HF,OC,TR,NU ¦ — [15%] CP\f* \w κράτος|strong="G2904"\w* \w αἰώνιον|strong="G0166"\w*. \w Ἀμήν|strong="G0281"\w*. To the rich

\w Τοῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w πλουσίοις|strong="G4145"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w νῦν|strong="G3568"\w* \w αἰῶνι|strong="G0165"\w* \w παράγγελλε|strong="G3853"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w ὑψηλοφρονεῖν|strong="G5309"\w*, \w μηδὲ|strong="G3366"\w* \w ἠλπικέναι|strong="G1679"\w*\f + \fr 6:17 \ft ηλπικεναι \+it rell\+it* ¦ ελπικεναι [10%] ¦ ελπιζειν [2%]\f* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w πλούτου|strong="G4149"\w* \w ἀδηλότητι|strong="G0083"\w* \w ἀλλ|strong="G0235"\w*᾿ \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w*\f + \fr 6:17 \ft εν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* (78.6%) RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ επι ℵA,I (19.8%) NU ¦ — (0.3%) ¦ three other variants (1.2%) (This and the following two sets are all handled together in \+it TuT\+it* as a single set, but with thirteen variants; I separated them so as to highlight the basic choices.)\f* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w*\f + \fr 6:17 \ft τω \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* A,I (91.7%) RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ — ℵ (7.1%) NU ¦ three other variants (1.2%)\f* \w Θεῷ|strong="G2316"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ζῶντι|strong="G2198"\w*,\f + \fr 6:17 \ft τω ζωντι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* (88.4%) RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ 2 (3.6%) ¦ — ℵA,I (6.8%) NU ¦ three other variants (1.2%) (If the original form were επι θεω, as in NU, who would change it to the longer, more complex form? The choice of NU is surely inferior.)\f* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w παρέχοντι|strong="G3930"\w* \w ἡμῖν|strong="G1473"\w* \w πάντα|strong="G3956"\w* \w πλουσίως|strong="G4146"\w*\f + \fr 6:17 \ft παντα πλουσιως \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵ [92%] RP,HF,OC,CP,NU ¦ 2 [1%] ¦ ~ 21 [5%] TR ¦ τα 12 A [2%]\f* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w ἀπόλαυσιν|strong="G0619"\w*·

\w ἀγαθοεργεῖν|strong="G0014"\w*, \w πλουτεῖν|strong="G4147"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w ἔργοις|strong="G2041"\w* \w καλοῖς|strong="G2570"\w*, \w εὐμεταδότους|strong="G2130"\w* \w εἶναι|strong="G1510"\w* \w κοινωνικούς|strong="G2843"\w*

—\w ἀποθησαυρίζοντας|strong="G0597"\w* \w ἑαυτοῖς|strong="G1438"\w* \w θεμέλιον|strong="G2310"\w* \w καλὸν|strong="G2570"\w* \w εἰς|strong="G1519"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w μέλλον|strong="G3195"\w*, \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w ἐπιλάβωνται|strong="G1949"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w αἰωνίου|strong="G0166"\w*\f + \fr 6:19 \ft αιωνιου \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [92%] RP,OC,TR,CP ¦ αινωιου HF ¦ οντως ℵA [6%] NU ¦ οντως 1 [2%]\f* \w ζωῆς|strong="G2222"\w*. A closing exhortation

\w Ὦ|strong="G3739"\w* \w Τιμόθεε|strong="G5095"\w*, \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w παραθήκην|strong="G3866"\w*\f + \fr 6:20 \ft παραθηκην \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* ℵA [80%] RP,HF,NU ¦ παρακαταθηκην [20%] OC,TR,CP\f* \w φύλαξον|strong="G5442"\w*, \w ἐκτρεπόμενος|strong="G1624"\w* \w τὰς|strong="G3588"\w* \w βεβήλους|strong="G0952"\w* \w κενοφωνίας|strong="G2757"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἀντιθέσεις|strong="G0477"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ψευδωνύμου|strong="G5581"\w* \w γνώσεως|strong="G1108"\w*

—\w ἥν|strong="G1510"\w* \w τινες|strong="G5100"\w* \w ἐπαγγελλόμενοι|strong="G1861"\w* \w περὶ|strong="G4012"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w πίστιν|strong="G4102"\w* \w ἠστόχησαν|strong="G0795"\w*. \w Ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w χάρις|strong="G5485"\w* \w μετὰ|strong="G3326"\w* \w σοῦ|strong="G4771"\w*.\f + \fr 6:21 \ft μετα σου \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* 048 [97%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ μεθ υμων ℵA [3%] NU (The letter is addressed to a single individual, and in case anyone should forget, the previous verse begins with “O Timothy”. The Alexandrian variant is clearly in error. To trot out the ‘harder reading’ canon in a case like this I consider to be irresponsible.)\f* \w Ἀμήν|strong="G0281"\w*.\f + \fr 6:21 \ft αμην \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* [97%] RP,HF,OC,TR,CP ¦ — ℵA [3%] NU\f*\sup ,\sup*\f + \fr 6:21 \ft The citation of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* is based on thirty-seven MSS—18, 35, 201, 204, 328, 386, 394, 444, 604, 757, 824, 928, 959, 986, 1072, 1075, 1100, 1247, 1249, 1503, 1548, 1637, 1725, 1732, 1761, 1768, 1855, 1864, 1865, 1876, 1892, 1897 [1:1-3:16], 2080, 2466, 2554, 2587 and 2723—all of which I collated myself. 1761 and 2554 are ‘perfect’ representatives of \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* in 1 Timothy, as they stand, and the exemplars of 444 and 2466 probably were. Since these MSS come from all over the Mediterranean world (Sinai, Jerusalem, Patmos, Constantinople, Bucharest, Aegean, Trikala, Athens, Mt. Athos [eight different monasteries], Grottaferrata, Vatican, etc.) they are certainly representative of the family, giving us the precise family profile—it is reflected in the Text without exception. In the statements of evidence I have included the percentage of manuscript attestation for each variant, within either ( ) or [ ]. I have used ( ) for the evidence taken from \+it TuT\+it*, which I take to be reasonably precise. For the variant sets that are not covered there I had to revert to von Soden and the apparatus of N-A\+sup 27\+sup*, supplementing from other sources where possible (Scrivener and Tischendorf)—the percentages offered, I have used [ ] for these, are extrapolations based on a comparison of these sources. I venture to predict, if complete collations ever become available, that for any non-Byzantine variants listed with 5 to 1% support (in my apparatus) the margin of error should not exceed ±1%; for non-Byzantine variants listed with 10 to 6% support the margin of error should hardly exceed ±3%; where there is some division among the Byzantine witnesses the margin of error should rarely exceed ±15%. But I guarantee the witness of Family 35. Please see the last footnote for Matthew for further information.\f*
